query:
SELECT role, COUNT(*) as total, 
       SUM(visualizar) as total_visualizar, 
       SUM(inserir) as total_inserir, 
       SUM(excluir) as total_excluir
FROM permissoes 
WHERE role IN ('Administrador', 'Armazenamento', 'Beca', 'Cerimonial', 'Controle', 'Coordenador', 'Financeiro', 'Fotógrafo', 'Gestor', 'Logística')
GROUP BY role
ORDER BY role
